about_the_game:
Game Name:
Escape Room Collection C2 Psychological Horror

Game Description:
A collection of escape room games with a psychological horror theme. In these games, where strong horror visual stimuli and clever psychological cues keep players both timid and captivated, you'll be locked in a room surrounded by a terrifying atmosphere where you must find clues and solve puzzles to escape.
Each game offers unique and challenging puzzles, with intricate clues and power-ups, unexpected ending routes. Can you survive the tense and terrifying atmosphere of the room, and only the smartest and most resourceful players will succeed in these thrilling escape room challenges.

Target:
1. Keep an eye out for any hints and avoid all dangers.
2. Find clues and solve puzzles to escape the escape room.
3. Meet all the secret room challenges.
4. Unlock all the chapters

How to play:
Once the game starts, you'll explore the game's built secret rooms, which you can tap to complete, so keep an eye out for every detail. On the right side of the game screen is a list of backpacks, where you can view the collected clue items, some items can be used directly, and some items may need to be combined with other items to generate new items to use them normally. The use of props requires a clever combination of daily life experience, but some props may not be able to think about its use according to normal ideas. The specific puzzles in each level are different and need to be explored by the player himself. Again, the game has multiple endings.

Skill:
The terrifying atmosphere and the route of multiple endings must be carefully observed and calmly analyzed. All clues may be hinting at something

Game Features:
Series Collection: Multiple chapters with connections, rich levels, intricate puzzles, all kinds of impossible possibilities, mind-blowing!
Thriller Horror: Thrill and excitement when in the oppressive horror atmosphere of the game!
Multiple endings: The game logic has designed multiple endings, which is full of fun!
Leisure decompression: Immerse yourself in the secret room of the game, find and explore, discover new possibilities, discover new clues and props, and guess the purpose of props after getting them, which is exciting and joyful.
Reasoning exercises: face a variety of difficult puzzles, messy clues. Actively use your brain, connect them, and solve the problems one by one. It's hearty.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOs 10.15 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
